replies.body:
{{champion:112}} Muwahahaha! Jayce, I finally got you cornered! I've imprisoned your police friends {{champion:51}} {{champion:254}}  so no one could help Piltover. There's nothing you or anyone can do to stop me! Hand over the Power Reactor and watch my glorious evolution unfold!
{{champion:126}} ...
{{champion:112}} ???
{{champion:126}}  I drop an Acceleration Gate and blast ‘em with a Hyper Charge. Face the future!

{{champion:103}} I have your companions under my control, for the last 20 minutes, Surrender now!
{{champion:126}} I drop an Acceleration Gate and blast ‘em with a Hyper Charge. Feel the thunder!
{{champion:103}} *rolls for evasion: 1* Oh come on!
{{champion:126}} *rolls for damage: 20*  Heh, gotcha!
{{champion:103}} ...

{{champion:103}} Oh no my tail is trying to kill me with the power of magic moon beans
{{item:3105}} Fear not im here!
{{champion:127}} oh no! not the aegis of the legio
{{item:3105}} thats right, not one can get past my legio of stardom
{{champion:103}} please use your power of stardom on my tails
{{item:3105}} yes your tail, i shall stare at your tail, you have a nice tail
{{champion:62}} hey, thats my tail
{{champion:127}} oh no! monkey man!
{{champion:62}} your reign of terror has come to an end exegesis of region lock
{{item:3105}} haha, silly monkey man i am the protector of women, no monkey shall touch women of the women tribe
{{champion:62}} wait until i have trained
{{champion:62}} i have now trained
{{champion:127}} oh no! monkey man has trained!
{{item:3105}} I AM DEFEATED!
{{champion:103}} you saved me monkey man.  please kiss me
{{champion:62}} no
{{champion:103}} ok
{{champion:127}} the end

That was boring, uninspiring, childish and autistic.
That sums up my critic of this comment.
I have an autistic friend, and I can assure you he has written many a stories better than this here pile of manure.

> [{quoted}](name=SPARKKY37,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=k8aELvJA,comment-id=00060000000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-17T22:34:02.923+0000)
>
> I have an autistic friend, and I can assure you he has written many a stories better than this here pile of manure.

Wait, why do you think autistic people are not able to write good stories?
He's saying Autistic people ARE able to write good stories.

"That was boring, uninspiring, childish and autistic.
That sums up my critic of this comment."

That about sums up the majority of people who post hateful shit on Internet.
With  {{champion:51}} &{{champion:254}} dead, as  a  last  hope{{champion:112}} roles for  suduction.

natural 20.
17 amazingly funny roles later {{champion:6}} is born.
Bruh I think that Jayce quote has become a legendary joke, its like a meme now, it'll never not be funny. I can't even think about it without laughing
Karthus speaks Bard!

It's because he's Karthus Lightsbane.  A mystical version of the already unworldly dead man walkin.

.... now I'm thinking of {{champion:104}}
pretty sure it's because karthus is a musician
does that mean that {{champion:37}} and {{champion:245}} and {{champion:83}} understand him too?
Elder dragon spawns top lane, i'll get the rumor spreading asap {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
For real though, the little story made the skins so much better, and they all ready looked great!
and now we wait for {{champion:83}}'s new skin......

Dragon Trainer Yorick!

...No- uh, hear me out.

Baby dragons for ghouls.

{{champion:113}} How is Bard JUST NOW getting a Bard skin?
{{champion:126}} Bard doesn't have skin?
{{champion:30}} No no, Bard is his name. And Riot gave him some clothes to dress him up like it's his day job. But, you know, he doesn't actually sing in taverns or anything.
{{champion:432}} You mean... like how Jhin is a psychopath, and doesn't actually grant wishes?
Since when can Bard actually speak?

He speaks through his chimes and music
But only Sona can understand what he's saying
Except since she can only communicate with her Summoner, she basically translates Bard's sentences however she pleases.
Sona is super sneaky you know

{{champion:37}} Adagio, Summoner
Silly Summoner, No one can understand Bard (but Karthus now can for some reason) his secrets are too powerful for any mortals to hear therefore they are jumbled into his musical sounds. (canon info)

I mean, Karthus IS the Deathsinger, so...

Musical sense anyone?

but Sona and Bard have an unspoken bond that they don't tell you about...because I made it up
and because it's puny

Jhin grants us what we've all been longing for... the sweet release of death.......
FeelsBadMan :gun:
Hey all! We made a mistake earlier and listed Karthus as a 750 RP skin. He's actually a 975 RP skin. We've updated the article to reflect his true price. Sorry for the confusion.
Can you please make a heavy metal bard skin and have him do a song with pentakill? I could imagine some insane chimes going off while the rip some killer songs. {{champion:432}}

{{champion:83}}   {{champion:82}}   {{champion:37}}    {{champion:30}}   *epic, heart dropping songs*

{{champion:432}}      *happy chime*

{{item:3070}} {{champion:2}} {{item:3070}} 

Way to forget the legend...

Shut up... and take my money!!!
...Call it Led Zeppelin Bard!! I already have Runes and Mastery pages for tanky Balloon, called Led Zeppelin XD
Who Remembers Dungeons & Demacians
Maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan roll20.net got lots of us still playing it.
Really no one noticed? That it says "I drop an Acceleration Gate and blast ‘em with a Hyper Charge" Jayce's Q is shock blast not hyper charge. XD Rito doesn't even know their own champions.
he says "hyper charge" when he does it sometimes though, so maybe that's what they're referencing
"Hyper Charge" sounds way better in that context, and Jayce is too busy being Jayce to care about his own abilities' names.

{{champion:126}} Hyper Charge is the name of a Shock Blast fired through an Acceleration Gate. It is like an acknowledged super-move combo with a specific name. For instance, take Ken Masters from the Street Fighter series. Ken's Super Combo in Street Fighter is called the "Shoryureppa", not "a-string-of-consecutive-Shoryukens", even though that's what it is. "Hyper Charge" is "a-Shock-Blast-fired-through-an-Acceleration-Gate". Hope that helps...
You definitely arent alone. Though uh, that hyper charge does stupid damage
Must get {{champion:432}}{{champion:432}}, if only for the sake of {{champion:432}}{{champion:432}}

A terrifying Riot initiated nerf is coming, what do you do? 
{{champion:126}} I drop an Acceleration Gate and blast 'em with a Hyper Charge. Face the future!

*rolls die* it works.

{{champion:126}} what did you roll?
{{champion:163}} um, hold on a sec...
{{champion:163}} 18?
{{champion:126}} 18. hm. okay. (checks rulebook) *nods*
{{champion:126}} with the last ounce of your mana, you charge up everything you've got in your rocks. pshhh pshh pshh, the earth around you rumbles, fault lines open up and emanate from where you stand. the monster you're chasing notices what you're doing. he tries to sprint away, out of range. he even dodges a few with his Korean Juking traits. but it's too late. *grins*
{{champion:163}} oh my god...
{{champion:126}} your rocks fly at him like they were shot out of an Acceleration Gate. the furry little devil tries his best to squirm out of it, but stands no chance. the first rock smashes into the side of his head, blasting him and pinning him against the trees like a well-placed frag grenade. he lets out a horrific Yordle cry, like nothing you've ever heard. like what the beast of the apocalypse would sound like when giving birth to a horde of demons as its birth canal is torn apart.
{{champion:163}} ... holy shit, that's pretty awesome.
{{champion:126}} your second and third rocks act like steam-powered giant robot fists pummeling into the poor little creature, as it bleeds from every possible orifice, and then a few more that you didn't know even existed. as it bleeds out, a mess of blood and intestines sprawled out over the roots of its deathbed tree, it cries out for its mother, begging you to spare its life, shows you a picture of its girlfriend in a firefighter uniform, tells you it will never place another toxic mushroom in another bush you want to enter again. it tells you it never meant to hurt anyone.
{{champion:163}} oh dear god. 
{{champion:126}} i only have one question for you, Laura Bailey.
{{champion:163}} ?!!?!!
{{champion:126}} ...how do you wanna do this?

wait a second.... 750 * 4 = 3000 (if you have all the champions and buy the skins one by one**)

but 3225 the pack of skins without the champions .-.U soo 225rp more for less clicks or what? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Karthus is 975, not 750.
karthus looks like vladimir and leblanc had a baby

Karthus is a 975RP tier skin.

Eh, I don't really like these skins, there's only one thing to do about that. Drop an Acceleration Gate and blast 'em with a Hyper Charge! xD


But jokes aside, all these skins look pretty cool and the story just sold 'em for me. I'll definitely be picking up Bard Bard sometime within the next few days. Good work on these ones, rito. :P
